# Twilight Country Road

This is a [Country Road](https://puzz.link/rules.html?country) puzzle with twilight clues - if a clue is visited by the path, it is a regular Country Road clue, giving the total number of cells visited in that region; if a clue is not visited by the path, it gives the total number of unvisited cells in that region.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2023/twilightCountryRoad1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
